sms_sms_compose_alert_not_enough_credits: You do not have enough credit to send SMS messages. Please top up your account.
You may not have enough credit to send messages to all of the selected contacts.
sms_sms_compose_sender_option_short_numb: Numbers that allow for replies (France only)
sms_sms_compose_recipient_label: Enter the number of a single recipient
sms_sms_compose_recipient_error_pattern: The recipient number must be in an international format.
sms_sms_compose_message_characters_left_: Your message contains one or more special characters.
sms_sms_compose_message_info_estimation_: The cost will vary depending on the destinations you are sending messages to.
Please note that this value is just an estimated guideline.
sms_sms_compose_message_stop_info_end: is added to the end of the SMS.
sms_sms_compose_message_stop_description: For legal reasons, your SMS will only be sent between 08:00 and 20:00, from Monday to Friday.
sms_sms_compose_message_advice_info: It is best to use alphabetical characters as a sender name for sending SMS messages. You can avoid certain operator filters on digital senders, namely mobile numbers.
sms_sms_compose_message_advice_descripti: Alphabetical sender customisation is offered by OVHcloud, and you can request it via
(automatic validation is immediate, manual validation is carried out within 24-48 hours).
sms_sms_compose_message_alert_maxlength: You have exceeded the limit of 255 SMS.
sms_sms_compose_no_stop_clause_label: I certify that the SMS is not for advertising purposes, and request for the STOP message to be removed.
sms_sms_compose_class_info_flash: The flash SMS will display directly on the phone screen.
sms_sms_compose_class_info_phoneDisplay: The standard SMS is the most commonly used SMS.
sms_sms_compose_class_info_sim: The SIM SMS is automatically backed up on the phone’s SIM card.
sms_sms_compose_status_failed: An error has occurred sending your SMS
sms_sms_compose_status_invalid_receiver: Your SMS could not be sent to the following number: {{invalidReceivers}} (invalid recipient)
sms_sms_compose_tip_compose_paragraphe_1: An SMS should have a maximum of 160 characters.
sms_sms_compose_tip_compose_paragraphe_2: If the message exceeds 160 characters, it will be broken down into several SMS messages, as follows:
sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_1: The maximum size of an SMS is 160 characters (GSM standard 03.38).
sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_2: The two tables below list the authorised characters.
sms_sms_compose_tip_size_paragraphe_3: Important: If you use characters that do not appear in the tables, they will switch to Unicode, and will reduce the maximum size of an SMS to 70 characters.
sms_sms_compose_add_receivers_select_lis: Select the files containing the recipients:
sms_sms_compose_add_phonebook_contact_in: To send SMS campaigns, it is best to use a CSV file listing all of the recipients.
sms_sms_compose_add_phonebook_contact_ko: Oops! Unable to retrieve contact list.
sms_sms_compose_message_commercial_descr: For legal reasons, commercial SMS messages will only be sent between 08:00 and 20:00, from Monday to Friday.
sms_sms_compose_no_commercial_clause_lab: I formally certify that the SMS is not commercial.
